short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: May help you if you have too many tabs open. Produces text containing title and address of all tabs in all Chrome instances.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension may be helpful to you:
1. If you have too many tabs open.
2. Don't have time to review or read them.
3. Despite of that you want to keep all the links and information behind them.

Tab Reader produce test which contains  title and address of each tab so you may store as a text file or a note and return to them later. After saving the text you may just close all the tabs and continue with clean Chrome and clean device memory so you may work faster and with less distraction.
